code: 'use strict';var inherits=require('inherits');var MD5=require('md5.js');var RIPEMD160=require('ripemd160');var sha=require('sha.js');var Base=require('cipher-base');function Hash(hash){Base.call(this,'digest');this._hash=hash;}inherits(Hash,Base);Hash.prototype._update=function(data){this._hash.update(data);};Hash.prototype._final=function(){return this._hash.digest();};module.exports=function createHash(alg){alg=alg.toLowerCase();if(alg==='md5')return new MD5();if(alg==='rmd160'||alg==='ripemd160')return new RIPEMD160();return new Hash(sha(alg));};
